article_title: Join Steve Kornacki, Joan Walsh & Blake Zeff at Inside Salon Politics Event
article_text:
Topics: #SalonPolitics, 2016 Elections, Blake Zeff, Inside Salon, Joan Walsh, Politics, Salon Events, Steve Kornacki, The Midterm Report, Video, Elections News, News, Politics News

Will Democrats hold onto the Senate in November? Can President Obama get anything done as a lame duck? In the coming ’16 primary, will Hillary Clinton face a real challenge from the left? Can a moderate Republican defeat the far right for their nomination?

Come discuss these topics and more at Inside Salon Politics on Wednesday, October 29th with Politics Editor Blake Zeff, Editor-At-Large Joan Walsh and MSNBC Host Steve Kornacki. Share the news, invite others and mention #SalonPolitics.

Q&A to follow. Complimentary wine and beer will be served for everyone 21+.

article_metadata.description: Salon's own Blake Zeff and Joan Walsh and MSNBC's Steve Kornacki take an in-depth look at American politics VIDEO
